name: BIOS Fear
overview: Little is known about this title as it was never released. According to the little that can be found is that it takes place in a near dystopic future. It's up to you to save what's left of humanity from its own greed and corporate profit motives. What little remain is of Earth's ecosystem is protected within giant bio-domes, and the dome systems are failing. You must find a way to fix them before all life on Earth dies.
